ReadOnly Property Column As Integer Implements IGridItemProvider.Column

summary.span: 取得包含儲存格或項目之資料行的序號 (Ordinal Number)。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

value.span: 以零起始的序號，識別包含儲存格或項目的資料行。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
